name: TrailRunningSounds
0:
”Alexa open Trail Running Sounds”
”Alexa ask Trail Running Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trail running sounds
des:
Embark on a swift journey through the heart of nature with Trail Running Sounds. You'll be enveloped in the vibrant and dynamic sounds of a trail run, meticulously crafted to transport you to the great outdoors from the comfort of your home.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Trail Running Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
